title: Doom & RotTR
body:
I’ve checked both cracks (thanks to Voksi!) and they seem to work just fine. At least until Doom Demo bypass will be fixed by devs/Denuvo.

No ETA for both repacks just yet. But they will be the smallest lossless repacks in the world. As always.

PS: I stand corrected, 3 Denuvo repacks incoming, JC3 including. Not primising they will be backwards compatible, my skills improved since JC3 and RotTR were repacked.

If Voksi will release more cracks, I’ll have a tough week!

Update: Inside works as well with this bypass.
